title: SBI able to support loan growth, lower deposit growth not a challenge: Dinesh Khara
description: SBI's Dinesh Khara assured that the bank can sustain loan growth despite slower deposit growth by leveraging excess investments in government securities. Khara addressed concerns, labeling them a statistical myth, and highlighted that the issue was seen historically. A balance between deposit and loan growth is anticipated by June-September 2025.
